caption.p: Binding pattern of C. fistula major chemical constituents with the PTR1 of L. donovani. 2D plot, surface representation of protein binding pocket residues, and its significant interactions with (A) proanthocyanidin B dimer, (B) 3,4-di- O-caffeoylquinic acid, (C) kaempferol rhamnosylxyloside, and (D) apigenin- C-hexoside- O-pentoside.
